channel.title: Monster Attacks
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monster Attacks" - How does it work?

item.title: Re: Monster Attacks
item.content:encoded:
First, you have to be in a Village. That village needs to have the Natural Research Facility. Every day at Dayroll, there's a chance that a monster will attack.

Also, the village can buy the upgrade Enticement Altar which can be used to summon monsters at the cost of resources.

item.title: Re: Monster Attacks
item.content:encoded: Where do i even got to fight monsters ?

item.title: Re: Monster Attacks
item.content:encoded: It is like a mission. Every success you get counts as one damage point. Ally bonuses apply, but only bring down the house jutsu can be used. Leaders get a .5 increase in total damage, and upgrades can also increase damage and lower kaiju hp. Sannin get there damage doubled.

item.title: Re: Monster Attacks
item.content:encoded: Each monster has a difficulty. You fight the monster in the same way you complete missions. Your level in whatever the stat the monster is tells you your number of chances at success, strength and range are the same, and allies help too. You attack the monster and how ever many successes you have is the amount of damage you do to it. The amount of stamina 'damage' it deals to you increase by 10 each time you attack it. For ex it starts at 10-20, next is 20-30, then 30-40, ect. Any other questions?
